title: Her Right To Flight
description: Gen never thought she could marry an accomplished airline pilot like Jayson. Her tenth wedding anniversary gala takes a turn when Jayson falls ill and his hidden life in another city with another family is exposed. Desperately in need of a kidney transplant, his fate falls into Gen’s hands. Her own past secrets surface to further threaten her comfortable life. While tragedy and betrayal snowball, Gen gets sweet words of wisdom from her incarcerated older sister, La’Yolanda. Gen is faced with the hardest decisions of her life; to exact revenge on her husband, to forgive him, to stay and trust God in chaos or to simply take flight?
author: Mikela D. Harris
